newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: MOREGRO SHARES SURGE ON STRONG YR EARNINGS.
newsitem.headline: MOREGRO SHARES SURGE ON STRONG YR EARNINGS.

text.p: Shares in Morkels Retail Group Ltd (Moregro), a South African furniture, clothing appliance retailer, soared to a fresh year high on Monday on healthy annual earnings reported on Sunday.
"The shares are up on the good results," a Johannesburg Stock Exchange dealer said.
"It a big jump but I wouldn't get too excited about it as the volumes aren't great."
By 1020 GMT Moregro shares were up 115 cents, or a massive 18 percent, to 750 cents in volume of 10,200 stocks.
Moregro on Sunday reported annual fully diluted share earnings at 60.2 cents from 46.1 a year ago -- up 30.5 percent despite tough economic and high credit conditions.
The firm declared a dividend of 16 cents a share from 13.0 cents before.
